Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dwight Gooden (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (SD)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,807,143 through salary arbitration...
7/28/1986: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $3,850,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/16/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $1,620,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago on 6/13/1989...
Traded from Philadelphia to Pittsburgh on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: LF Von Hayes. Going to PHI: RF Kevin Bass)...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/15/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Released by Oakland on 6/25/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
